name: Nightscape City
description:
Improve your club with various items. Place objects on Isometric Grid based plane.

  • Speakers
  • Mixers
  • Counters
  • Lights
  • Dance Tubes
  • Furnitures
  • Walls
  • Seperators
  • Floors




Increase the luxury level of your club to satisfy your customers. Design your club with fancy dance floor, different types of lights, build rooms and declare as VIP. Sometimes there may be fights, sometimes people may not like the type of music. Some people prefer techno music but some prefer trance. You can also upload your own music to music playlist. It's your job to take care of all this.




Hire or fire an employees to manage your club. Higher skill requires higher management skill. Your customers want quality service.





Unlock various drinks. Some people wants exclusive cocktails, some of them want expensive.

  • Juice
  • Beer
  • Coctail
  • Wine
  • Tequila
  • Rum
  • Vodka
  • Gin
  • Whiskey





Prepare unforgettable nights for your customers by organizing special events. Increase your popularity with concept parties.
